ai-vv24:1.4_0: like a daughter-in-law of a low-worm,
ai-vv24:3.3_0: It is the fruit of that deed,
ai-vv24:5.3_0: When you’ve discarded the straight ground,
ai-vv24:6.1_0: I rejoice in the four quarters.
ai-vv24:6.4_0: on the fourteenth and the fifteenth days,
ai-vv24:7.1_0: and the eighth day of the fortnight,
ai-vv24:8.1_0: He refrains from killing living creatures,
ai-vv24:8.4_0: avoid a care of the rod,
ai-vv24:9.1_0: Pañcasikha had developed the five wives.
ai-vv24:10.3_0: and my complexion was like me.”
ai-vv24:11.2_0: My enthusiasm is full of desire.
ai-vv24:11.3_0: settles down on the edge of mind.
ai-vv24:11.4_0: I’ve been reborn in the Garden of Delight.
ai-vv24:12.1_0: I have not completed what the Teacher taught,
ai-vv24:12.2_0: from the Buddha, Kinsman of the Sun,
ai-vv24:12.3_0: When the mind is immersed in samādhi,
ai-vv24:13.1_0: “How long is it taken so long in mind?
ai-vv24:13.4_0: But if you know the life force?”
ai-vv24:14.2_0: three hundred and three hundred years
ai-vv24:14.3_0: I stood here on the earth
ai-vv24:14.4_0: I’ll go after passing away from here.
ai-vv24:15.1_0: “Don’t be afraid, do not be afraid,
ai-vv24:15.4_0: they’ve given up the wrong way.”
